org.jgentleframework.services.datalocator.data
Interface RepositoryProcessor

public interface RepositoryProcessor

interface này mô tả các chức năng của một Registry RepositoryProcessor, các methods chính trong việc quản lý Repository, bao gồm việc khởi tạo, thêm bớt từ khóa key, value, backup thông tin, ...

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
Key, Value

Method Detail

createBrandNew

void createBrandNew()
Creates brand new Repository.

Throws:
RepositoryRuntimeException - throws this exception if can not create brand new repository

createKey

<T> void createKey(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                   java.lang.String keyName,
                   Key<?>[] subKeys,
                   DataType keyType,
                   Key<?> keyParents)
Creates key instance appropriate to the given key name, key type, and parents key ... In case parents key is null, the creating key will be located on the Root of Repository.

Parameters:
clazz - the object class specifies the type of key.
keyName - the given key name
keyParents - the parrents key
subKeys - an array containing all sub keys of creating key.
keyType - the key type
See Also:
DataType

createValue

<T> void createValue(java.lang.String valueName,
                     java.util.List<T> valueData,
                     Key<T> parentsKey,
                     DataType valueType)
Creates value instance appropriate to the given value name, value type, parents key, ... the value must be created in one key so the parents key must not be null.

Parameters:
valueName - the given name of value
valueData - the list containing all value data of creating value.
parentsKey - the key holding the creating value
valueType - the value type
See Also:
DataType

createValue

<T> void createValue(java.lang.String valueName,
                     Key<T> keyParents,
                     DataType valueType,
                     T... valueData)
Creates value instance appropriate to the given value name, value type, parents key, ... the value must be created in one key so the parents key must not be null.

Parameters:
valueName - the given name of value
keyParents - the key holding the creating value
valueType - the value type
valueData - the list containing all value data of creating value.
See Also:
DataType

flush

void flush()
Flushes the Repository. This will write any changes to current repository.

getAllSubKeys

java.util.List<Key<?>> getAllSubKeys(ComparatorKeySortedBy sortedBy,
                                     Key<?> key)
Returns the list containing all sub keys of the given key and all keys of all sub keys existing in whole its hierarchical system.

Parameters:
sortedBy - the Comparator represents sorting rule corresponding to all sub keys in returned list. The null value equals to ComparatorKeySortedBy.NAME_ORDER_KEY
key - the given key
Returns:
returns the list containing all sub keys of the given key if they exist, otherwise returns null.
See Also:
ComparatorKeySortedBy

getAllValues

java.util.List<Value<?>> getAllValues(ComparatorValueSortedBy sortedBy,
                                      Key<?> key)
Returns the list containing all values of the given key and all values of all sub keys existing in whole its hierarchical system.

Parameters:
sortedBy - the Comparator represents sorting rule corresponding to all values in returned list. The null value equals to ComparatorKeySortedBy.NAME_ORDER_KEY
key - the given key
Returns:
returns the list containing all values of current key if they exist, otherwise returns null.
See Also:
ComparatorValueSortedBy

getKeyFromName

Key<?> getKeyFromName(java.lang.String keyName,
                      Key<?> parentsKey)
Returns the sub key of current key appropriate to the given key name.

Parameters:
keyName - the given key name
parentsKey - the given paretns key
Returns:
returns the key appropriate to the given name if it existed, otherwise returns null

getKeyFromPath

Key<?> getKeyFromPath(java.lang.String keyPath)
Returns the key appropriate to the given key path.

Parameters:
keyPath - the given key path.

Ex: "HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG/System_Information/RMI_Port"

Returns:
the key from path

getValueDataFromPath

java.util.List<?> getValueDataFromPath(java.lang.String valuePath)
Returns the list containing all value data existing in a value appropriate to the given value path.

Parameters:
valuePath - the value path.

ex: "HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG/System_Information/RMI_Port" các rẽ nhánh key phân chia bằng dấu "/", nhánh cuối cùng phải là tên Value.

Returns:
the value data from path

                    throws java.io.IOException

removeKey

Key<?> removeKey(java.lang.String keyName,
                 Key<?> keyParents)
Rmoves a key.

Parameters:
keyName - the given key name
keyParents - the parents key of key need to be removed. In case the parents key is null, container will find the removing key in root of Repository.
Returns:
returns the removed key.

removeValue

<T> Value<T> removeValue(java.lang.String valueName,
                         Key<T> parentsKey)
Removes a value.

Parameters:
valueName - the given value name
parentsKey - the key holding the value need to be removed.
Returns:
returns the removed value.

saveBackup

void saveBackup(java.io.FileOutputStream fileBackup)
                throws java.io.IOException
Creates the backup file of the current Repository.

Parameters:
fileBackup - the FileOutputStream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

saveRepository

void saveRepository()
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           java.io.IOException
Back up all information of Repository to default file name which is specified in Repository.saveFile(). This method will automate invoke flush() method before it process back-up task.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
